name: No Pants Wizard
description:
You are a wizard without pants trapped in Nowhere, your spell went wrong and your amulet stone is broken. Travel through 3 mysterious dimensions and collect all the amulet's fragments.

This is our entry for the Ludum Dare 45: Start with nothing. Vote for us!

Mouse Left Click: to select the potions, jump and fly.

Keyboard arrows: to slide on ice, jump and fly.

         Made with
